name: A Hell of Two Exorcists
description:
A Hell of Two Exorcists

-------------------

No more rituals... Hell took over, time to clean the place. An order from the holy highness himself.

Play with your friend in this co-op game, you play as a muscular priest exorcist, expert at your job but this time, it's too late, no more gentle routine, we take the guns to banish demons.

Walk in a small town, enter houses after houses and purge the place. 

PS: Your briefcase serves no purpose it's just for you to RP with your friend.

-------------------

MULTIPLAYER (not mandatory but can help)

Average Completion Time: 5-10 min.

Other game related to the series to understand the references that exist in the game: 

https://antoinefauville.itch.io/ahellofanexorcist

-------------------

Keyboard Controls Move  —  WASD Camera — Mouse  Shoot — Mouse Left Click Switch weapons — Mouse Wheel Space — Jump N or B - Communicate with your friend

-------------------
